text: Uye rangarirai apo Isa (Jesu) mwana wa Mariya akati: “Imi vana vaIzrairi! Ini ndiri mutumwa waAllah kwamuri, kuzodudzira izvo zvakauya pamberi pangu zviri muTorah, uye kupa mashoko akanaka emutumwa achauya mushure mangu, zita rake anonzi Ahmad (zita rimwe raMuhammad (SAW)).” Asi paakauya (Ahmad (SAW)) kwavari nehumboo huri pachena, vakati: “Aya masaramusi ari pachena.”
